modules.title: Contact
modules.content:
Email: info@educativo.in
Phone: +91 9076 114 175
Address: Mumbai, India

modules.title: Privacy Policy
modules.content:
At Educativo, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Any details you share with us, such as name, email, or phone number, are used only to provide you with information, counselling, and support related to our courses and services.

We do not sell, share, or rent your data to third parties. Your information is stored securely and used strictly for communication and guidance purposes.

By submitting your details, you agree to be contacted by our counsellors through phone, email, or WhatsApp regarding course updates and admission assistance.

hero.title: Unlock your potential with our Online Programs!
hero.subtitle: 500+ Courses · 50+ Specialisations · Learn with leading universities

features.title: Ease of Learning
features.desc: Flexible schedules and self-paced learning for working professionals.

features.title: Diversity of Programs
features.desc: Wide range of specializations and universities to choose from.

features.title: Equivalent to Offline
features.desc: Online degrees are recognized and valued by employers.

faq.q: Is online MBA as good as regular MBA?
faq.a: Absolutely. Online MBAs have gained widespread recognition and credibility.

faq.q: Can an online MBA get placements?
faq.a: Yes, online MBAs offer placement support and are valued by employers.
Yes, all our partner universities offer UGC/AICTE approved programs.
Exams are conducted either online through proctored systems or at designated exam centers.
